           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content10461104">
          <div id="boxatt10461104" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12715611">
              <a id="link_12715611" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/basicspeech" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715611,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715611});">
               Basic Speech
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12715626">
              <a id="link_12715626" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/costume" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715626,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715626});">
               Costume Design
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12715628">
              <a id="link_12715628" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/queerperform" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715628,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715628});">
               Queer Performance
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link18422506">
              <a id="link_18422506" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/theatresociety" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18422506,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18422506});">
               Theatre &amp; Society
              </a>
             </li>

          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar for Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10101170">
          <div id="boxatt10101170" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10101170">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10461105">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10461105">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10461105">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10461105">
          <div id="boxatt10461105" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23397616">
              <a id="link_23397616" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ibh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23397616,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23397616}); ">
               International Bibliography of Theatre &amp; Dance with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Definitive research tool for the study of theatre and the performing arts with abundant links to scholarly full text. In dance, journals include Dance Research Journal, Journal of Dance and Somatic Practices, Performance Research, Research in Dance Education, and Writings on Dance. Theatre journals include Comparative Drama, The Dramatist, Early Theatre, Live Design, Medieval &amp; Renaissance Drama in England, Modern Drama, and New England Theatre Journal. Embargoes may apply.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23397375">
              <a id="link_23397375" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23397375,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23397375}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Standard scholarly index to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present. Strong in theatre criticism.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23397454">
              <a id="link_23397454" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muse.jhu.edu/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23397454,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23397454}); ">
               Project Muse
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text database of journals from several academic presses. Theatre journals include Comparative Drama, Journal of Dramatic Theory and Criticism, Modern Drama, TDR, and Theatre Journal. Dance journals include Dance Research and Dance Research Journal. No embargoes.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10461106">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10461106">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10461106">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           More Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10461106">
          <div id="boxatt10461106" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12715476">
              <a id="link_12715476" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715476,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715476}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to historical literature for all regions excluding the U.S. and Canada, 1450-present. Numerous links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12715479">
              <a id="link_12715479" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=LCO" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715479,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715479}); ">
               Literature Criticism Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               All full text, this extensive archive of criticism of 20th century literary works comes from scholarly journals and books.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12715742">
              <a id="link_12715742" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715742,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12715744">
              <a id="link_12715744" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715744,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12715745">
              <a id="link_12715745" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rih" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715745,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715745}); ">
               RILM Abstracts of Music Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to scholarly and popular literature in musicology, ethnomusicology, dance, and other music-related disciplines, with many links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19886267">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19886267">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19886267">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Theatre Reviews
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19886267">
          <div id="boxatt19886267" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23392894">
              <a id="link_23392894" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23392894,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23392894}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Includes selected reviews 1980-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23393040">
              A Guide to Critical Reviews: American Drama 1909-1982
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Call # 016.8092 S163g
               <br />
               Index to reviews from the early 20th century to the eighties.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23217878">
              A Guide to Critical Reviews: The Musical, 1909-1989
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Call # 016.8092 S163g
               <br />
               Musical theatre reviews 1909-1989.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23397702">
              <a id="link_23397702" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23397702,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23397702}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Theatre reviews from newspapers (national and local) around the globe, 1980s to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23392949">
              <a id="link_23392949" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/1645522?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23392949,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23392949}); ">
               New York Times Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Includes New York theatre reviews from 1850s to present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23392887">
              <a id="link_23392887" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23392887,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23392887}); ">
               OmniFile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Includes the Reader's Guide, with theatre reviews from 1980-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23392962">
              <a id="link_23392962" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rgr" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23392962,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23392962}); ">
               Reader's Guide Retrospective
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Theatre reviews in popular periodicals, 1890-1980.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23218997">
              Reader's Guide to Periodical Literature
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Call # 051 R286g
               <br />
               Theatre reviews 1900-1996.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23392922">
              <a id="link_23392922" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/ttda/start.do?userGroupName=mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23392922,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23392922}); ">
               Times Digital Archive
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive of the London Times from the 1700s to present. Includes London theatre reviews.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
